definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: She was found shacking up with three of the guys by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她被她父親發現跟三個男孩過夜了。

sentences.english: For first 3 days leave overnight as mask.
If I have more than a seven-hour layover, I'd like to stay overnight.
sentences.chinese: 若是轉機要等超過七小時，我希望在那裏過夜再飛。

sentences.english: You should spend the night at Boners.
Trevor, make him invite you to a sleepover. During the sleepover
sentences.chinese: 特雷福，你想辦法讓萊昂內爾邀你在他家過夜。

sentences.english: No friends or relatives are allowance to your employer's house or let them stay overnight.
sentences.chinese: 僱主嚴禁你帶朋友或親屬到僱主屋企或讓她們過夜。

sentences.english: One Friday, 12-year-old Janet was going to stay all night with her friend Amy.
sentences.chinese: 一個週五，12歲的珍妮特要陪她的朋友艾米過夜。

sentences.english: The merchants lied at a caravanserai that night.
sentences.chinese: 商人們那天晚上在商隊旅館過夜。

sentences.english: Could the high-oxygen SCL be worn overnight safely?
sentences.chinese: 高透氧SCL過夜配戴是否安全？

sentences.english: Fernandez will be kept overnight at an area hospital for observation.
sentences.chinese: 費爾南德斯將在地區醫院接受觀察過夜。

sentences.english: Small cottages are available for visitors who wish to spend the night.
sentences.chinese: 如果想在此過夜，景區還可以向你提供小別墅。

sentences.english: If you win, we can get Dirty when you get home.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的伍茲，如果你贏了比賽，我們就一起回家過夜。

sentences.english: It's my job to see that the boilers are stocked up last thing at night.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是負責臨睡前給鍋爐添好過夜煤。

sentences.english: She decided to stop and ask if she could rest there for the night.
sentences.chinese: 她決定停下來，問一問是否能在這裏過夜歇歇腳。

sentences.english: They stopped off overnight in Edinburgh .
sentences.chinese: 他們中途在愛丁堡停留過夜。

sentences.english: Has anyone ever put you up in their home for a night?
sentences.chinese: 有人留你在他們家過夜嗎？

definition: to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
to place an order/to book ahead
